name: grid puzzle
description:
a minimal puzzle game for Playdate.

controls: d-pad. pressing any direction on the d-pad will send you one step in the current direction of the arrow you're standing on and change that arrow to whichever direction you pressed. pressing in the same direction as the current arrow will change the current arrow to an X instead, granting you one point but preventing you from landing on that square again. landing on an X or going off the edge of the screen results in a game over.
